languages.text: "Это утверждение истинно. Многие опасные философии выглядят безупречно логичными, однако несут в себе опасные дефекты, неведомые их творцам". {n}В голосе техножреца звучит сомнение. Грохочущая глубина оставляет вокс Паскаля, возвращая ему привычные шипящие интонации.{/n}

"This statement is true. Many dangerous philosophies appear impeccably logical, yet have dangerous defects that their creators were unaware of." {n}There is doubt in the Tech-Priest's voice. The tone of thundering profundity drains from Pasqal's vox, giving way to his familiar sibilance.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Это утверждение истинно. Многие опасные философии выглядят безупречно логичными, однако несут в себе опасные дефекты, неведомые их творцам". {n}В голосе техножреца звучит сомнение. Грохочущая глубина оставляет вокс Паскаля, возвращая ему привычные шипящие интонации.{/n}

The tone of thundering profundity drains from Pasqal's vox, giving way to his familiar sibilance.{/n}

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「この声明は真実である。多くの危険な哲学が非の打ち所がないくらい理論的に思えますが、その創造主が気づいていなかった危険な欠点があるのです」{n}技術司祭の声には疑いの響きがあった。雷鳴のような深みのある声音がパスカルのヴォクスから聞こえなくなり、かわりに聞き慣れたシューシューという音が聞こえた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. Many dangerous philosophies appear impeccably logical, yet have dangerous defects that their creators were unaware of." {n}There is doubt in the Tech-Priest's voice. The tone of thundering profundity drains from Pasqal's vox, giving way to his familiar sibilance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「この声明は真実である。多くの危険な哲学が非の打ち所がないくらい理論的に思えますが、その創造主が気づいていなかった危険な欠点があるのです」{n}技術司祭の声には疑いの響きがあった。雷鳴のような深みのある声音がパスカルのヴォクスから聞こえなくなり、かわりに聞き慣れたシューシューという音が聞こえた。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “这种说法是正确的。许多危险的哲学理念看似无懈可击，但逻辑中却包含着某种致命的缺陷，就连创造者本人可能都没有意识到。”{n}帕斯卡声音中雷鸣般的低沉声音不见了，他的声音又带上了平时的咝咝声。{/n}
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. Many dangerous philosophies appear impeccably logical, yet have dangerous defects that their creators were unaware of." {n}There is doubt in the Tech-Priest's voice. The tone of thundering profundity drains from Pasqal's vox, giving way to his familiar sibilance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这种说法是正确的。许多危险的哲学理念看似无懈可击，但逻辑中却包含着某种致命的缺陷，就连创造者本人可能都没有意识到。”{n}帕斯卡声音中雷鸣般的低沉声音不见了，他的声音又带上了平时的咝咝声。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Diese Aussage ist korrekt. Viele gefährliche Philosophien erscheinen zwingend logisch, haben aber gefährliche Fehler, die ihrem Schöpfer nicht bewusst waren." {n}In der Stimme des Techpriesters liegt Zweifel. Der Unterton der donnernden Tiefgründigkeit schwindet aus Pasqals Vox und weicht seinem üblichen Zischen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. Many dangerous philosophies appear impeccably logical, yet have dangerous defects that their creators were unaware of." {n}There is doubt in the Tech-Priest's voice. The tone of thundering profundity drains from Pasqal's vox, giving way to his familiar sibilance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Diese Aussage ist korrekt. Viele gefährliche Philosophien erscheinen zwingend logisch, haben aber gefährliche Fehler, die ihrem Schöpfer nicht bewusst waren." {n}In der Stimme des Techpriesters liegt Zweifel. Der Unterton der donnernden Tiefgründigkeit schwindet aus Pasqals Vox und weicht seinem üblichen Zischen.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Cette affirmation est exacte. Bon nombre de philosophies dangereuses semblent d'une logique imparable et souffrent néanmoins de failles majeures dont l'auteur n'avait pas conscience. » {n}Vous ne décelez pas l'ombre d'un doute dans la voix du technoprêtre. La profondeur habitée qui animait le vox de Pasqal reflue et laisse place à son sifflement coutumier.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. Many dangerous philosophies appear impeccably logical, yet have dangerous defects that their creators were unaware of." {n}There is doubt in the Tech-Priest's voice. The tone of thundering profundity drains from Pasqal's vox, giving way to his familiar sibilance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Cette affirmation est exacte. Bon nombre de philosophies dangereuses semblent d'une logique imparable et souffrent néanmoins de failles majeures dont l'auteur n'avait pas conscience. » {n}Vous ne décelez pas l'ombre d'un doute dans la voix du technoprêtre. La profondeur habitée qui animait le vox de Pasqal reflue et laisse place à son sifflement coutumier.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Esa afirmación es cierta. Muchas filosofías poseen una lógica aparentemente impecable, pero tienen efectos perniciosos que su creador no supo anticipar en su momento». {n}Percibes duda en la afirmación del tecnosacerdote. El tono de atronadora profundidad abandona la voz de Pasqal, dando paso a su familiar sibilancia.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. Many dangerous philosophies appear impeccably logical, yet have dangerous defects that their creators were unaware of." {n}There is doubt in the Tech-Priest's voice. The tone of thundering profundity drains from Pasqal's vox, giving way to his familiar sibilance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Esa afirmación es cierta. Muchas filosofías poseen una lógica aparentemente impecable, pero tienen efectos perniciosos que su creador no supo anticipar en su momento». {n}Percibes duda en la afirmación del tecnosacerdote. El tono de atronadora profundidad abandona la voz de Pasqal, dando paso a su familiar sibilancia.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Bu önerme doğru. Tartışmasız bir şekilde mantıklı görünen ancak yaratıcılarının farkında olmadığı, muhataralı yan etkileri bulunan sayısız tehlikeli felsefe ortaya çıkmıştır." {n}Tekno Rahip'in sesi, tereddütlü çıkıyor. Pasqal'ın voksundaki gürleyen derinlik yok olup yerini tanıdık bir vızıltıya bırakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. Many dangerous philosophies appear impeccably logical, yet have dangerous defects that their creators were unaware of." {n}There is doubt in the Tech-Priest's voice. The tone of thundering profundity drains from Pasqal's vox, giving way to his familiar sibilance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bu önerme doğru. Tartışmasız bir şekilde mantıklı görünen ancak yaratıcılarının farkında bile olmadığı tehlikeli yan etkileri bulunan sayısız tehlikeli felsefe ortaya çıkmıştır." {n}Tekno Rahip'in sesinde tereddüt var. O gürleyen derinlik Pasqal'ın voksundan kayboluyor, yerini tanıdık bir vızıltıya bırakıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
